string-array.name: goals
string-array.item: • Efficiently manage academic tasks and schedules.
• Easily interact with their educational institution and dormitory.
• Maintain communication with classmates and teachers.

string-array.name: purposes
string-array.item: • Dormitories, so students can promptly receive information and alerts.

string-array.name: features
string-array.item: 1. Linking to an educational institution and/or dormitory: Receive up-to-date notifications and news.
2. Tasks and schedule: View and create tasks, plan schedules for classes and events.
3. Reminder settings: Set reminders for important events and deadlines.
4. Statistics and analytics: Track your progress and results.
5. Communication and interaction: Communicate with other students and teachers through built-in chats and forums.
